Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.replication.regionserver

Interface PeerActionListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractFSWALProvider, AbstractWALProvider, AsyncFSWALProvider, FSHLogProvider, RegionGroupingProvider
@Private public interface PeerActionListener
Get notification for replication peer events. Mainly used for telling the WALProvider to close some remote WAL if not used any more.
